description:
Custom Rich Presence (playing status) manager for Discord. Features run on startup and minimizing to tray.


Changes:
- When connected, the app shows your username in the bottom left instead of in the title bar.
- Fixed the installer having broken languages.
- Removed "None" timestamp type because it's no longer supported by Discord.
- Updated Azerbaijani (new translator, Korsinemi), Belarusian (new translator, Korsinemi), Bengali (new translator, Korsinemi), Bosnian (new translator, Korsinemi), Spanish, Hungarian (new translator, Levi), Armenian (new translator, Korsinemi), Indonesian (new translator, delaragon) and Burmese (new translator, Korsinemi).
.exe will install the program to %appdata%\CustomRP; .zip is a portable version of the program.
AppVeyor Build 205
